definition: (bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
stick/club/cudgel/smart/capable/strong/wonderful/classifier for legs of a relay race

sentences.english: A dual watermarking algorithm that accepted JPEG compression was presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一类抗压缩的鲁棒加半脆弱双水印算法。

sentences.english: A robust repetitive controller for roll eccentricity compensation of cold mill is designed.
sentences.chinese: 设计了用于冷轧机的轧辊偏心补偿的鲁棒重复控制器。

sentences.english: This paper studies the robust stabilization problem of chaotic Lurie system.
sentences.chinese: 研究混沌鲁里叶系统的鲁棒镇定问题。

sentences.english: In this paper, robust ambients (ROAM) is proposed to eliminate those security breaches.
sentences.chinese: 为了消除上述安全隐患，提出了鲁棒灰箱演算。

sentences.english: First, the condition of realization of robust diagonal dominance at a certain point is given.
sentences.chinese: 首先给出了系统在某一点处实现鲁棒对角优势的条件。

sentences.english: Firstly the setpoint tracking controller is designed in terms of the robust H2 optimal performance objective.
sentences.chinese: 首先设定值跟踪控制器设计的鲁棒H2最优性能目标。

sentences.english: This paper considers the robust stabilization problem of an affine nonlinear uncertain systems.
sentences.chinese: 考虑了仿射非线性不确定系统的鲁棒镇定性。

sentences.english: Exponential dissipativity of Cohen-Grossberg neural networks with mixed delays and reaction-diffusion terms;
sentences.chinese: 讨论了混合时滞区间神经网络的全局鲁棒指数稳定性。

sentences.english: A new blind beamformer with improved Hopfield network is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一种鲁棒的盲神经网络波束形成算法。

sentences.english: A new robust adaptive current control scheme for the induction machine is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种新型感应电机鲁棒自适应电流控制方案。

sentences.english: The stability perturbation bounds of a single-input-single-output system with both parametric and dynamic uncertainties is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了混合摄动模式下反馈系统鲁棒稳定的摄动界。

sentences.english: In this paper, the realizations of robust diagonal dominance by constant compensator are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了利用常数补偿器实现鲁棒对角优势的问题。

sentences.english: Experimental results show that our proposed method can track articulated hand robustly and efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 实验结果表明，该方法可以鲁棒地跟踪关节人手。

sentences.english: The robust exponential stability in mean square of the system is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了该系统的鲁棒均方指数稳定性。

sentences.english: This paper proposes a robust mesh watermarking algorithm using wavelet transform for semi-regular meshes obtained by remeshing.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种小波变换域的鲁棒网格水印算法。

sentences.english: Studies the robust Stackelberg game of supply chain based on uncertain demand.
sentences.chinese: 研究了需求不确定条件下的供应链鲁棒主从对策问题。

definition: Bayes (name)/Thomas Bayes (1702-1761), English mathematician and theologian

pinyin: zui4 da4 si4 ran2 gu1 ji4

definition: to fit (data to a model)/a (close) fit

pinyin: Meng2 te4 Ka3 luo2 fang1 fa3
